REASON: Hotflashes, vaginal dryness, painful intercourse, insomnia, almost nightly headaches (middle of night) that don't help insomnia, rapidly aged skin, muscle cramps, thin hair, facial hair, loss of muscle tone, high blood pressure (was always low before).  Incessant perspiration.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: The hotflashes have improved somewhat.  However, I am sick of the constant perspiring!!  My skin is messed up (was always complimented on my skin looking so young before).  Aged.  Am on DHEA cream for vag. dryness. Seems to help.  The headaches at night are maddening.  I NEED SLEEP.  I was only stage one with no metastases (spelled right?)  I wonder if this is necessary.

REASON: Haven't really experienced any side effects with Aromasin to date.   I had breast cancer 9 years ago and took  tamoxifen (no effects) for three years and then Femara.  Femara made me feel like I was 100 years old.  I took for two years and then quit.  I think that it was over several months that it made me feel that way.  It seemed like it was a cumulative effect over time.   So far, tho, so good with Aromasin.  We'll see over time

All went well for first 2 months; then side effects kicked in. Almost immediately, had a craving for sweets; then at 2 months, severe mood swings, some Pain bottom of feet; At 3 months, shoulders and neck pain, severe insomnia; 3 months, nausea and dizzyiness.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: The most dibilitating side effects for me, because I have to speak publicly in my work, is the naseau (It seems to sweep over me and then passes about half an hour). I had been taking right after breakfast, I am now going to take in afternoon. It seems nausea occurs with me about 4-5 houyrs after takining.

REASON: severe bone, joint, muscle pain, loss of short term memory. This has disrupted my life completely, although I keep a good attitude. I needed to see that I am not alone. I am considering going off the med to see where I am at with pain, so I can gauge what meds I need and dont need. I want my life back !
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: It was prescribed to me after all other choices of aramatase inhibitors failed. It does the job, but after having a total hysterectomy in 2010, I wonder if I even need it, I certainly dont need the side effects !

REASON: depression, bone pain
Side effects - due to Aromasin or not?

AROMASIN: Thinning hair
facial hair ( particularly in last year)
vagine dryness -almost immediately
libido - significantly diminished - within two years
insomnia -  since begining
joint pains in feet, hips and achiness in legs - since beginning
hot flashes/night sweats  - have diminshed
neuropathy in fingers
distortion in one hand of fingers with large lump on thumb (just this past year)
carpal tunnel
Bloody-awful unexplained shoulder and neck pain which extended into head and facial muscles and jaw for 6 months
Now jsut diagnosed with  mild degenerative osteoarthritis which is causing me to walk with a cane
Bone scan in 20011 showed above average bone density for age.
Still alive
RATING: I started tamoxifen in 2006 and was changed to Aromisin in 2008.  I am on it optionally now, but I am truly scared to go off it as I am sure it is keeping me alive and micromestastes at bay.  Quality of life is an issue thought and right now I cannot do the things I have enjoyed all my life, including dance.  It might not be Aromasin but certainly from reading previuos posts, I am wondering.
REASON: F

24/7 Headaches (enough to get an MRI which was clean), gained 30 pounds in 4 months, burning in arms and legs that feels like they are on fire, joint/muscle pain (have RA which was under control until this drug), extreme fatigue, memory loss, vaginal dryness.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Took tamoxifen for a year with a few side effects (hot flashes were the worst) but bearable.  They switched me to Aromasin in February because of being post-menopausal.  Feels like I have had one long headache ever since.  Stopped taking it 4 days ago - does anyone know how long it will take to get out of my system?  Going to ask my oncologist to put me back on tamoxifen.

REASON: I started on Arimidex after lumpectomy, chemo & radiation. I didn't last long - 6 months - felt like 80 years old. My oncologist switched me to aromasin. It was tons time better! 2 years later - in last 6 months-  I have severe pains and need Tylenol or ibuprofen daily. Legs, hips mostly. Most recently, I can't close my right hand into a fist and middle finger is "trigger" finger. Working out at gym seems to help. Feel sluggish but my family doctor has me on phentermine (30 mg) and I take it almost daily unless I sleep in. (insomnia if you take too late in day). Tired of pain and not being able to walk fast but will tough it out if necessary!!  Question I have is does anyone ever get these little shots of pain randomly all over every once in a while?

Rapid 30lb weight gain.foot and hand aches,no energy, carpal tunnel type pain in wrists, sad feeling and tired.VERY stiff in joints, especially after sitting or sleeping. Irritable!! Did I mention very dry in the Netherlands. I also took tamoxifen for >3 yrs and I prefer that drug to Aromasin. Hope it's helping but I feel lousy : (

Weight Gain, Nausea, bone pain, developed protruding growths on my tendons in my hands, foot pain, acne, menopausal symptoms even though I have already gone through menopause, water retention, craving for sweets, a veeling of fullness or heaviness all over my body.  Only someone who has taken this drug should prescribe it!  Of couse the drs don't tell you about the side effects because they have never taken it.  My dr actually said and I quote " I can't believe you would go through Chemo and then question me about taking a little pill"  I said the reason I was questioning him was because I was scared to death and I had cancer, all he had was a degree!  I asked him did he have cancer?  Has he gone through this?  He said no, I said so pretty much you don't know the answer right? "  He was so pissed off at me but I don't care, it is my body, my breasts, my life and I have a right to know.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I have 4 more years to go on this drug and I am afraid that it is only doing me harm vs getting rid of any cancer in my body.  The chemotherapy I did for 8 months wasn't this bad.  If I thought I could get away with not taking this drug and be "normal" again I would stop it in a heartbeat.  Just typing this is making my hands ache.  it is a horrible thing to not be able to discuss the side effects with someone who knows what they are talking about.  There are very few drs that have been through this so of course they say that there are no side effects, they have never taken this drug.  they perhaps should listen to the people that have taken the drug but none of us have those things that they have,,,,a degree, all we have is cancer.
10  days25 mg 1X D

REASON: hands, knees, and feet really hurt. hot flashes, mood swings, fatigue.  my blood glucose levels and blood pressure have increased even though I am losing weight
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I had stage 0 breast cancer/dcis.  I don't really know if it is worth all the agony.

REASON: Stiff joints, extreme pain in joints and muscles.  Like giving myself the flu everyday.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I have early stage breast cancer--I resent having a blanket dose of 25mg per day prescribed when less doses are effective according to the studies I've read. 25mg is the same dose for mestaaticized BC. used to strink tumors--i don't have that!!

REASON: arthritis in my hips, which was a nuisance but did not really affect my quality of life, has been greatly exacerbated.  I cannot put on my socks or tie shoes.  Pains in hips, knees, shins and feet at night.  Difficulty rolling over in bed and getting out of chairs.  I also have carpal tunnel symptoms. I am having a trial period of a month off the medication.  I have been off for three weeks.  I have been going to physical therapy three times a week for the past ten weeks, and have finally seen quite a bit of improvement the last week or two.  Also have hot flashes.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: My first breast cancer (2002) had no estrogen involvement.  My second, this past year, had a very small amount.  I am thinking of asking the oncologist to take me off this medicine when I see her next week after my four week trial dropping the exemestane.

REASON: TERRIBLE JOINT AND MUSCLE PAIN 24/7 HAVE A HARD TIME STRAITENING LEGS OUT IN THE MORNING. SIT A FEW MINUTES HAVE A HARD TIME TO GET MOVING. ACNE IS REALLY BAD AND DEEP ANY ONE ELSE HAVE THIS. GENERALLY HURT ALL OVER AND VERY TIRED. CRAVE SWEETS SOMETHING AWEFUL
Very stiff joints after sitting for 10-15 min. Hands swelling.   Extreme shoulder pain. Weight gain. Hard to get out of a chair after sitting for just a few minutes.
Unbelievable joint pain!!!
Hot flashes, joint pain - comes and goes, numbness in arms/ hands, loss of appetite, weight loss, acne.

AROMASIN: Acne started week 5. Am worried about  more possible androgenic effects like facial hair or thinning of hair on head! Not sure I'll be able to stay on this drug.
REASON: F

Within 2 weeks after starting this medication these symptoms set in. Numbness, major joint pain, all fingers/thumb triggering, burning, cannot make a fist in both hands, pain in forearms and now shooting pains in hands.  Stopped medication approx. 4 weeks ago but still have these side effects. My  Doctor and also the Oncologist were pushing carpel tunnel syn surgery.  They seem to  have no knowledge of this serious side effect of the medication I was prescribed. Or had their head in the sand.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Any suggestions to reverse side effects would be greately appreciated and if anyone can give me an idea of a time frame they got back to normal after stopping this medication,I would welcome that information also.
4  months 1X D

REASON: Severe thumb and wrist pain. Trigger thumb.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I started taking Femara which only lasted for 3 months. I had severe side effect such as body pain, confusion, difficulty getting up in the morning and walking. I would hobble around the house for 2-3 hours before I could really stand up straight and walk normally. My joints hurt so bad I could not sleep at night.

REASON: Off and on shoulder pain, extreme depression, tiredness, hot flashes, muscle and bone pain in legs, dizziness, heart palpitations, headache, hair loss, memory problems, extreme sugar cravings
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I started off with only hot flashes, but now have so many side effects I'm considering going off the drug. Tried to take it every other day, but there was no improvement. The two side effects that affect me the most are the heart palpitations and the depression. I'm also worried about bone loss due to osteoporosis and having already broken a wrist and a hip.

REASON: After 2 years on Tamoxifen, switched to Arimidex.  Only lasted 3 months, then switched to Aromasin.  Muscle and joint pain all over body, trouble walking in the morning, hair loss, gained 30 lbs, severe fatigue.  Most severe pain was tendonitis in both thumbs and both wrists which was debilitating.  Had to wear splints and was awake all night with pain.  Oncologist discounted this as a side effect of the medication so I am looking for treatment elsewhere.  Off this drug for 2 weeks, I am already seeing significant improvement to wrists, but not to thumbs.  I have currently been switched back to Tamoxifen.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I feel guilty for not completing the three years on this drug.  I can accept the full body pain which at times can be depressing.  I can also accept and endure the other side effects, but the wrist and thumb pain...feeling as if all of my tendons are moving and popping, and almost fainting from the pain each time I take a shower...l could not endure that.  I am hoping that this damage is not permanent!

REASON: Must decide if the side effects are interupting the quality of your life.  Muscle stiffness and joint pain limit my activities.  Doctors don't always tell you side effects you might experience.  Report every physical and emotional change to your physician.

Because Arimidex caused so many side effects (I posted several times on the Arimidex page), my doctor suggested trying Aromasin. After taking just one pill, I had painful, sudden reflux causing painful, long-lasting burning in my esophagus.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Arimidex had also caused many digestive problems, but not the terrible burning. The original side effects from Arimidex were nearly gone when I started Aromasin, but it made the digestion problems start all over again: reflux, burning, bloating, gas all the time, smelly stools, and loose stools. With this much discomfort and interference with my daily activities, I stopped at one pill and will wait till symptoms improve and try again. If this does not work, I am stopping altogether. My surgeon is wonderful and agreed with me that existing in misery in order to take a pill that may (or may not) help with a recurrence of cancer isn't much of a life. I'd rather be functional and enjoy life to the fullest than be miserable for five years taking a medicine that my body is clearly rejecting! It concerns me that this type of medicine may have long lasting effects on our bodies. Reading the posts for Arimidex and Femara nearly bring tears to my eyes -- we are not making this up, yet it seems that we have to defend ourselves if we have a doctor who refuses to acknowledge with compassion what we are going through. That's why I quit two oncologists and have a new, very understanding and empathetic doctor. What I want as a patient is to be heard.

REASON: Took Tamoxifen for two years-switched to Aromasin third year at doc's suggestion.  Less dangerours side effects.  Bones good. Horrible hot flushes and lack of sleep becasuse of. Vaginal area dried up. Gained 30 pounds immediately and have less energy (lack of sleep-exercising less?)Memory loss-have a horible time remebering names of even people I know well sometimes.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Went off for over two months and slept better and had almost normal skin in vaginal area.  Checked in with oncologist who suggested that as my hot flushes were not a great deal less than before, I might consider going back on as we don't really know if I would recurr or not without it.  Cost has gone up dramatically, but husband does not want to take a chance of recurrance.  Memory loss is my greatest concern, other wise can deal with the rest. (KY gel)

REASON: Insomnia, rolling hot flashes, severe joint pain, bone pain, muscle pain, nausea & vomiting, 30 pound weight gain in the first 6 months, fatigue, and some hair thinning.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: The pain is worse in my feet and hands, sometimes debilitating. I have had to go on several "medication vacations" of 2-3 weeks duration every so many months -- with my Oncologist's knowledge - in order to agree to stay on the Aromasin for 5 years. HATEFUL drug

REASON: Intense pain on my shoulders and the outside of my arms.  I could feel the pain even when my arms and shoulder were still.  I cried out in pain.  I did not take pain medication because of a long drive to work.  I stopped taking it for a month earlier this year to see if it was causing the pain.  I think I need to stop it for a longer period since the shoulder/arm/elbow pain has increased significantly over the past year.  A shoulder specialist told me it was a pinched nerve; my family doctor said it was osteoarthritis (funny how it started in both shoulders and arms at the same time, isn't it); my original oncologist didn't think aromasin was the problem.  However, my keen intuition says it is and the shoulder pain comments I've read from others taking aromasin, tells me it is.  I'll speak with my new oncologist after the holidays.

I was on femara prior to aromasin.  The pain was awful. I ached in my knees so bad I couldn't walk at times, feet hurt when I first stand up. Week hand muscles, hair is not growing back like it should. Night sweats,ache like I have the flu most days. Memory is better than it was on Chemo but not back to normal. Dr. switched me to Aromasin and the pain is less. It is bearable but I still have all the same symptons.  5 years of this makes me wonder - there must be a better way.
muscle pain, extreme increase in blood sugar and blood pressure that came under control once stopped medicine.
hands hurt and could not make a fist, found doing simple chores was a chore could not sleep because pain was so great
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: it may have helped me with the breast cancer but the side affects are terrible

REASON: Severe joint pain in fingers,knees and hips
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Better then Arimidex but switching to tamoxifen

REASON: I have not taken this drug. I chose to have a total vaginal hysterectomy with removal of my ovaries.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: There are 3 places that estrogen comes from. Ovaries, Adrenal Glands and Fat Cells. I have removed my ovaries and I eat very well and exercise. I would rather live a quality life than one filled with pain. I'm mentally stable and love life. I've read so many cases of women who are taking these estrogen blockers and still have a recurrance. I took femara and by the 4th day I couldn't straighten out my left middle finger, had back pain and headaches. It's a choice you have to make. I wish everyone the best and remember one thing. You're in charge of your own life. There are success stories of people who contine to keep  cancer at bay by the way they choose to live. Exercise and diet go hand in hand, one without the other will not work. I went straight into menopause after surgery but I'm  taking suppliments that are estrogen free to handle the hot flashes. If you need any positive reinforcement please email me. I'll be happy to help. I'm not a doctor, just a woman who has had breast cancer and chooses quality of life.

REASON: I have had NO side effects with this medicine and would highly recommend it to anyone who has been on Femara with bad side effects.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Although I haven't been on this medicine for a long time, I know that I would have already experienced the side effects by now.  I was on Femara (which to say the least, was a total nightmare)for about 2 months but the side effects were well on their way within a few doses.  Aromasin is a godsend!

REASON: I am experiencing hot flashes; severe joint pain with extreme stiffness after sitting for more than 20 minutes; carb cravings; worsening of carpal tunnel symptoms; numbness in fingers; imsomnia; uncontrolled emotional swings (unexpected crying); difficulty to concentrate (could be residual chemo brain); pronounced fatigue due to greater joint pain experienced.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I would like to switch to an alternative aromatase inhibitor but I'm afraid they all have negative side effects.  I will try to eliminate or at least cut down on animal proteins and instead attempt to get more protein from grains, fruits and veggies.

REASON: Started Aromasin two weeks ago after 7 months on Femara. Switched due to side effects, which have been worse on aromasin. I have severe fatigue. It's like going through chemo again. Joint pain, bone pain, headaches, hot flashes, having trouble sleeping. Heaviness in chest for last two days, like I had after each Herceptin treatment. I see my oncologist next week. I'm almost to the point of going off these meds and taking my chances. Quality of life is so important to me. If I have 5 or 10 years before the cancer returns, I'd rather live it without these symtoms!!!

joint pain and stiffness, extreme anxiety, hyped up, sleep disturbance, memory loss, hot flashes - but the worst was that I had frequent heart palpitations and several episodes of cardiac arrythmia which has stopped now that I am off the drug.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I think the extreme depletion of estrogen caused by this drug was more than my body could handle.  I know the studies are positive in terms of it being effective in preventing a recurrence for stage 1 breast cancer, but I did not want to sacrifice my heart in the process!

REASON: initially arm and wrist pain culminating in severe pain of the wrists mri scan confirms ulnar synovitis
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Why does this occur? What is the treatment? Do the symptoms lessen after one stops taking the drug(two years ago in my case)I am seeing a rheumatologist and taking hydroxychloroquin with little effect

REASON: right arm hurts between shoulder and elbow, had issue with left ankle hurting like it was broken.  left leg hurts early in the morning, must use heating pad to sleep.  But still better than Femara.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Aromasin is the best one for me so far.  Femara is awful Arimidex caused mood changes and joint pain.  It seems that they could come up with something better.  Has anyone had ankle issues?

REASON: Terrible joint and muscle pain.  No energy whatsoever.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Started off on Tamoxifen and my consultant changed that after two years to Arimidex but with the joint pain was changed to Aromasin.  Unfortunately I am still in severe pain - paracetamol etc do not help and strong painkillers upset my stomach.  Feel like stopping Aromasin altogether but scared of the bc recurring.

RATING: Femara did not work for me
REASON: knee and joint pain.
joint pains,carpal tunnel,hot flashes, facial sweating-not associated with the hot flashes, trigger finger and foot pain.
fatigue, important joint and bone pain, dryness, loss of sexual life
have been on Aromasin almost 1 yr..have just now noticed ankle and wrist pain ,particularly in the am. Awaken during the nite with numbness in both arms
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Have been on Tamoxifen 5 mo.

AROMASIN: Arimidex 1 yr
Like Aromasin much better than previous meds
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: 12  months

REASON: had serious carb cravings gained 20#s in the 1st 2 months; depression; headaches 24/7; felt stiff-with difficulty getting from sitting to standing-had difficulty walking; felt out of breath; fatigue; legs hurt; stomach/intestinal issues; insomnia
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I was diagnosed in Oct 01 with infiltrating lobular carcinoma, had a tumor greater than 10cm, no nodes were involved.  did 3 months chemotherapy, & 5yrs of Tamoxifen.,it was tolerable.  My oncologist put me on Femara, took it 2 months, had about 25 side effects...I told my Dr. I cannot take this any more, get me off of this.  So was put me on Arimidex, tried it for 2 months - found it to be equally untollerable, many side effects, felt like I had chemo brain much worse than when I was on chemo, to the point of not being sure I could find my way home on several days...told my doctor that it was not worth it, who cares if it might prolong life if you are unable to function, told them I was going to end up on Soc Sec disability for mental impairment if I stayed on it, it scared me to be on it.  So then they put me on Aromasin...after 2 months started getting headaches, felt ill (flu-like + more) all the time, was exhausted all the time - insomnia for 3-4 nights, then would "colap

REASON: severe wrist pain, frozen thumb, couldn't bend at all without bad pain. Tired,no energy and slight depression
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Was treated for breast cancer in 2000 followed by chemo radiation and then tamoxafin.Started aromasin 1 1/2 years ago.Quit last september and feel awesome!!! Slight pain in wrist, everything else is gone. My quality of life is more important. Good luck to you all

REASON: Total loss of libido. Bone pain. I did not have a recurrence of breast cancer while taking this drug, but I have no way of knowing whether or not it protected me.

Took Tamoxifen for 2 yrs with side effects that included extreme hot flushes, nausea (like morning sickness), horrible insomnia & headaches.  Switched to Aromasin for next 2 yrs and it was tolerable for the first 6 months with same side effects as Tamoxifen.  Then the bone & joint pain in the outer extremities started. Couldn't get out of a bed or a seated position or do stairs without feeling like a cripple.  Mornings were worse & I too had the 'claw' effect with terrible weakness in my hands. Ankles felt fragile, as though the bones would break with the slightest pressure.  Once healthy libido disappeared, urogenital system dried up & cholesterol levels tripled, although no change in exercise & diet. Doctor switched me to Femara 2 months ago.  After the 1st week, I actually slept for two whole nights & felt awesome! Then the side effects of the Femara kicked in & it's starting to feel the same as with the Aromasin.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I'm so thankful to have found this website! Over the last few years, I've so often thought that I was the only one experiencing these awful side effects. Until diagnosis, I was very fit & worked out 5x/week - weights and cardio. I continued to work & work-out even through chemo cycles. Now I feel like a 90 yr old asexual being. Chemo-induced menopause presented its own challenges but these Aromatase-Inhibitor side effects continue to affect the quality of my life.  Doctors are quick to offer Rx for side effects but each Rx has its own risks & side effects. It's a domino effect & I just want to feel 'normal' again & get on with my life.  It would be so different if we were dealing with a broken arm.  An X-ray would show the break, time would heal the fracture & then it would be nothing but a memory.  Nobody knows if these AI drugs even work on something we don't even know is or isn't there.  Quality vs Quantity of life should be addressed by somebody!

REASON: Bad pain in joints,wrist and thumb the worst.Insommnia,I was treated by both by the GP Nothing worked.It's getting worse as the days go by.Have been taking for  months after Femera which was just as bad
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I have stopped taking for 3 weeks now,I can bend my thumb,and pain isn't as severe.Lost 12 pounds too, which was a bonus!Still have insomnia,and I'm going to try to see my Gp for that today.Took today off work.

REASON: joint pain.trigger thumb.carpo tunnel,insommnia,pain in feet.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I want to go off,I hate taking it and would like to know if it will go away

RATING: post op treatment of breast cancer
REASON: joint pain--especially in fingers and feet.  Greatly increased appetite and carb cravings--weight gain
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Difficult to rate this medicine until I know the benefit outweighs the side effects.

REASON: Horrible insomnia, brain fog, depression, food cravings/weight gain.  Like worse case of PMS ever and getting worse each month. Lost 70 pounds after diagnosis & kept off till started Aromasin.  Put 40 back on in about 3 months. Just couldn't make my brain care or tell me to stop craving carbs.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I was estrogen+ and HER2+. Had mastectomy/chemo/radiation and over 2 years on Tamoxifen. Did great. Switched to Aromasin and immediately things started going wrong.  After one year, I have refused to take.  Even people at work commented how much better I seemed to be after I stopped taking for two weeks. Began sleeping the whole night w/in two days of stopping.  Have lost 4 lbs. My brain works! Oncologist REALLY wants me to be on adjuvant therapy for another 2 years or so. Will start Arimidex next week. Trying to be positive.

REASON: Stiffness in hands, feet, knees and neck. Fuzzy head, memory loss.  Feel "old". Achy when I get up from sitting. Bone density is declining per scans to opteopenia. Same side effects but worse w/Arimidex.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I took tamoxifen 1st year, Arimidix my second year,Aromasin my 3rd yr(now) and thinking of asking my doctor to switch to Femara or back to tamoxifen for the last 2 years.

REASON: Severe joint pain, carpal tunnel syndrome in left arm, painful feet, weight gain, digestive problems, especially constipation.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: My doctor put me on Aromasin after I had complained about the unbearable side effects I was experiencing with Arimidex.  However, after a couple of months of the new drug I felt even worse than I had felt when taking Arimidex.  I ache all over all day and night and can no longer exercise or carry things. It is now 18 months since I first started taking exemestane medicine,  and I have decided to give it up for a month before I next see my cancer specialist.  He had mentioned to me about five months ago that, since I was one of those patients who had experienced extreme side effects, perhaps I could benefit by switching to Tamoxifen.  I must say I'm not keen.  I have discussed the question with my family doctor and pyschotherapist, and both agree that, in the end, only I take the decision to stop. So that's what I am going to do.

REASON: After three weeks of taking this drug my doctor switch me to arimidex (not much better) due to joint pain, headaches, nausea and vomiting.
Trigger thumb and wrist pain.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I started taking Aromasin as an alternative to Arimidex, which had given me severe joint pains and general discomfort.  Apart from developing trigger thumb and wrist pain - since dealt with by my rheumatologist - I have been feeling much better on Aromasin and no longer have painful feet and joints.  A great improvement.

REASON: Depression, anxiety, frequent hot flashes.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I had no side effects from the previous drug I was on, which was Femara.  As soon as I started taking Aromasin I felt a deep depression overcome me, as well as considerable anxiety.  I don't know yet if the drug is helping slow down my cancer.  I've been on it for a little over 2 months.

REASON: pain in hands, pinky and ring finger on both hands stiff, severe wrist pain, pain in feet in morning, sweats, tingling sensation before a sweat, fatigue, pain in toes, nighttime pain in legs Especially calves, extreme insomnia, problems with short term memory
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: DO THESE SIDE EFFECTS LAST AFTER TREATMENT WITH THIS DRUG has ended?

REASON: a great deal of joint pain

Foot and leg achiness, short term memory problems.  Feel very old some days but that has not deterred me from going to the gym four times per week.  I am in better shape today than before my BRCA. I take Tylenol or ibuprofen for the pain.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: As my oncologist said, it is only pain.  There are no real side effects due to the leg and foot pain.  I am Factor V positive and cannot take tamoxifin.  I trust my oncologist as he is one of the pioneers in discovering and treating hormone receptive BRCA.  Thanks to my doc at the U of Michigan, I have an excellent prognosis, and that is really what it is all about. No pain, no gain!

REASON: Tired, short-term memory loss, travelling pain throughout body, frozen thumb, stiff fingers.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: On tamoxifen 1 1/2 years and aromasin about 2 years.  Doctor switched me to aromasin due to estrogen driven tumor. Increased to 600-800 IU of Vitamin D. This eliminated the travelling pain. Frozen thumb is pretty much back to normal. INCREASED VITAMIN D REALLY HELPED THE PAIN! Eliminated carbonated drinks containing phosphoric acid.

REASON: pain in hands/fingers locking, shoulder pain, very tired
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: was on three months, lots of joint pain, was on Fosamax at same time which has same side effects, went off both, felt better, went back on Aromasin, hands stiff and painful again

AROMASIN: AROMASIN
REASON: REASON
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: SIDE EFFECTS FOR ABILIFY

REASON: Extreme Weight Gain, High Cholesterol, Extremely High Sugar Levels
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I recommend this medicine for people not concerned with weight gain. For Bipolar it is a great medication. Mind wise I was fantastic, but my physical conditions are horrible. Now pre-diabetic. Switched to Seroquil XR 50MG. Working great!

REASON: Abilify brought me back to life. I was so sick and within a week i was feeling worlds better. I can not even describe how much it had helped me. No side effects.
I have woken up consecutively around 4 or 5 am since being on the drug and have not fallen back to sleep, causing me to be extremely tired.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I take it in addition to lithium. I find it has helped stabilize me but being overly tired causes me to be a wreck and worse off then before. I am going to try decreasing my dosage and see if I can sleep then.

REASON: Twitchy, jumpy, leg cramps. Serious decrease in attention span, continues long after discontinuation of drug - may have ruined my attention ability forever.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: After discontinuing the drug about 5 years ago, some serious side effects remain. Lost my attention span. Cannot read a full book, only articles about the size of those in a magazine, also cannot concentrate on a movie or tv show past about one hour. RECOMMEND YOU TO AVOID THIS DRUG AT ALL COSTS. DOWNSIDE IS NOT WORTH IT. OF COURSE, YMMV.

REASON: Tremors, insomnia, nausea, extreme weight gain, anxiety.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: My son was put on ability after suffering from depression and hallucinations. His anxiety level increased and he would go through periods of severe vomiting and nausea. He also developed insomnia. His weight started out at a thin 150 pounds within one year he was 245. We changed psychiatrists and she added zoloft and took him off the abilify. He has been off for over a year and still has extreme Carb cravings and is struggling to lose weight despite the fact he still has bouts of extreme nausea and vomiting.  I feel very strongly that abilify has caused lasting permanent side effects. Please do not let someone you love start this medicine.

REASON: Very drowsy all day, anxiety
major weight gain, has slowed me down a bit, but I'm not bothered by it - I still move too fast anyway
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: best drug I've ever been prescribed - lifted my depression when used as an add-on and stopped the racing thoughts that I always had and thought were normal

REASON: feeling of "drunk driving", blurred vision.. insomnia, but then extremely tired all day.. restless.. complete loss of concentration. eye twitching. my mood improved.. but side effects were too bad.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I finally stopped when I was too scared to drive and had a few total breakdowns at work and literally couldn't work or do my school work.. i lost ALL concentration and then went to see another pdoc for ADD/ADHD.. i stopped taking abilify but the eye twitching never stopped.. in fact, ive had random muscle spasms/contractions that have spread all over my body and become more constant as time goes on.. i have been off abilify for almost 2 months.... i feel my nerves sparking under the tip of my nose like theyve gone haywire.. the muscles in my legs, knees, feet, neck, EVERYWHERE... spasm ALL day long.. making it horribly hard for me to sleep now and some days more than others make it hard to focus.. going back to my doctor again later this month to see if theres possibly ANYTHING that can be done to help..

REASON: slurred speech, unsteady, acting like drunk
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I took it in the morning but it made me tired. I'm only on 1/2 a pill because I'm so sensitive to these type of meds. Then I tried it before bed but thought it kept me up.

AROMASIN: I go go go all day doing things until I'm wiped out and in pain.
I forget to take it at night so took it this morning and felt like I was drunk being obnoxious and crying easily.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: 11  days1 mg 1X D

REASON: shaking twitching over emotional
restlessness, insomnia
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: switched from clozaril to abilify because i had gained a significant amount of weight on the clozaril and was literally obese, drooling, and stupid. when i switched 9 months ago for a little over a week got less than 2hrs of sleep a night. went through many sleep medications (regular ambien 10mg, trazadone, lorazepam 2mg) all of which helped somewhat, adding an hour or two until I was prescribed ambien cr 12.5mg. getting 6 to 7 hours of sleep, lost over 50 lbs and feel much more like myself. This drug worked wonders for me after the side effects were treated.

REASON: The biggest side effects I have had are weight gain, and insomnia, and sleepiness.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: This drug has given me my life back. It took getting to 5mg for the depression tolift and stay lifted. I started at 2 mg ,and the depression lifted in three days, but didn't stay lifted, so we slowly kept increasing . I am so glad my doctor suggested this med. There are side effects, but I will tolerate them because the depression was horrible. The other side effect I have is gettign up early , around 7 am ,which I like .  Give it a try, and start the dose low if your sensitive to medication.

REASON: rapid heart rate. tremors in my hands similar to that of alcohol withdraw. fatigue. feeling washed out emotionally and disconnected from life. highly increased sexual desire. nausea, often awakening to feelings like morning sickness. decreased reflexes/reaction time. increased anxiety. increased paranoia.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: This is an awful, awful drug as are most antipyschotics. For 2 years we played with the abilify dose ranging from 5-15mg. We tried adding other drugs and removing other drugs all to make one drug work and combat the unpleasant side effects. Finally settled for abilify 10 mg plus clonazapam.

AROMASIN: In the end, doctors push these drugs and won't even toy with the idea that maybe with proper therapy in mild cases of mental disorders, one can thrive without meds. I finally pulled myself off and continue to keep it secret from pro-drug persons. Little if any withdraw. I still go to therapy, I am thriving much better in therapy without meds. I suggest trying this if at all possible instead of meds. You can always go back to meds if this isn't working.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: 2  years10 mg 1X D

REASON: Dizziness, no appetite
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I already feel better, even though it's only been 9 days.  My mind is more clear and I have less racing thoughts.

REASON: 2 days on 10 mg, then 5 days on 5 mg.  Accentuation of existing feelings of being drained, even on 5 mg.  I couldn't even sit on a park bench - reclined - a lady was very concerned - asked if I was OK, if there was anything she could do.  Lack of life force - near lack of ability to even look after myself.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I wondered about starting off on 2.5 mg to give my system the chance to get used to the side effects, but the psychiatrist said this was "no dose".  Thought I would try anyway, and double the dose after a couple of weeks, but after reading these other comments, I don't think I'll bother.

REASON: Daughter had severe muscle and leg pains. D/C after 5 days. "First cause no Harm" is what I follow for my child. The ABILIFY user sheet that came with the drug, the sheet said to report immediately to the doctor about the side effects. I did.
restlessness despite being very tired
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: This medication was not for me.  The first day was fine and made me feel better with more energy, but in the following days, I became unable to sit still.  I would be so tired, but I had to move.  I still take Abilify occasionally when I feel very low, but only for one day.

REASON: My daughter has experienced bouts of depression whilst taking these meds, tiredness very sleepy all the time, has no energy anymore, lost all motivation always mopey now and moaning, whingeing, very irritable, extreme hunger that is beyond ridiculous, not happy with any part of what this medication has done to my daughter except her violence and anger has almost completly gone. but fear that the pro'c do not outweigh the cons here, my daughter just isnt happy ever anymore very sad for me as her mother to watch am considering weaning her off these meds as soon as i have discussed with her pysciatrist.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Tried Risperdone first (short term 3 months) did absolute wonders = apart from extreme weight gain. cannot go back to this apparently as have been told it is a short term drug only.

REASON: We complained with the psychiatrist about the medication risperdal, because even after two years we didn't see much improvement with it and my son was always much more nervous with than without risperdal.  The psychiatrist recommended to change to abilify and that was much worse.  My son didn't want to sleep anymore and was very disturbed and cried a lot.  The psychiatrist insisted to continue and recommended to combine abilify with seroquel.  Seroquel should in theory bring his sleep back.  Not so in practice.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Life was hell for father and son during abilify medication time.  I am very pleased I took my son off it.  As a father of an autist, I would like to take the drug to try and understand what it does, however as I permanently need to take care of my son, I can't afford the risk.  It is a scary drug.  I can't recommend it.

REASON: At higher doses, heart palpitations, anxiety, blurry vision, tooth decay, muscle tics, restlessness.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I am sticking with the lowest dose (2.5mg) which has made big changes for me (less depression, more even moods and energy). I've tried higher doses and the difference was negligible but the side effects were much more of a problem.

REASON: tiredness,  weight gain.  The side effects have gottwen so bad that I was forced to quit the medication against dr.'s advice,  out of fear of death due to weight gain.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I will admit that I am somewhat biased:  I am absolute opposed, moral grounds, on the use of any mind-altering drugs for any purpose. Also,  due to my years of negative experiences with psychiatry,  my viewpoints tend somewhat toward the antipsychiatry side.  I am in no way connected with the Church of Scientology.

REASON: so sleepy, hiccups, anxiety, can't breathe deeply, major hunger, very warm
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Hiccups were terrible, especially since I interract with the public. Slowed down so much, my manager told me to kick into gear which had never been a problem before.I am so hungry I want to eat everything I see. I'm also on Prozac but I needed an add on, think I'll ask for Wellbutrin again.

REASON: severe muscle weakness, tremors that have yet to stop 2 months in, not sleeping, pacing

I had terrible side effects to abilify, my reflex started getting slow and slow, i could not move fast, i started acting slow, had difficulty driving and working. My doctor said i was having parkison like symptons, so i stopped and now i am back to normal.
Tremor, anxiety, chest heaviness & pain, severe fatique, dizziness, loss of motivation, loss of libido, stroke-like episodes, weight gain, blurred vision, rapidly changing body temperature
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: This drug turns you into a mindless numb zombie while effectively attacking your nervous system creating serious life-threatening side-effects. The pill pusher that prescribed this poison to me refused to answer my phone calls while I was having a stroke which resulted in a frightening trip to the emergency room. The ER doctors had no idea how to treat me so I was essentially ejected from the premises. This drug will KILL you. I had no choice but to go completely off this drug cold turkey because my doctor totally abandoned me and still refuses to talk to me. I've been off Abilify for a week and I'm still feeling its harmful effects. AVOID AT ALL COSTS. This POISON will ruin your life.

REASON: I had akathisia (restless movement) from Abilify. My psychiatrist added propranolol and it completely stopped.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: It started working within a week or two, lifting me out of depression since it was paired with an antidepressant. I still have depressive episodes but they usually aren't as bad as they were in the past.

REASON: i would studder sweat like crazy eye twitching hyperactive cry for no reason heart pounding out my chest really high blood pressure pass out from panic attacks insomia talk really fast umm flame up inside theres more thid pill sucks i thought i was going to die
Abilify is a wondeful pill.  Its the only med that helps with (voices) and mania.  Compared to other atypical antipsychotics the low side effects are very minimal.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: insomnia, flat feeling, tired in AM, my head feels like its buzzing making it difficult for me to sleep, loss of motivation, hunger in the morning, increases my prolactin, does not give me akathisia - which is a very good thing.  Pdoc would rather give me Geodon, but I always insist Abilify because it does not give me akathisia.

AROMASIN: I'v been taking this med for 7 years.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: 3  years10MG 1X D

REASON: i love this pill it has been so good for me no more mania and just finally feel normal again...life was grim before this med!!!!
I really don't feel any positive results but what I do experience is sleeplessness and more anxiety at certain times(mainly around people)
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I think that these drug companies make studies to try and prove that the neurons in out brain aren't performing properly and they come up with these expensive drugs that don't really help most people. I have much better results and can live normally with my Alprazolam. They even had me on Cymbalta at the same time as Abilify just as trial and error. My problems are with anxiety disorders triggered by certain circumstances and not a problem with the way my neurons in my brain are firing. I would say that Abilify is just another expensive drug the pharmaceutical companies are trying to promote for greater income instead of positive results in patients. I don't think the box above got my dosage right. I was started out on 30mg twice a day and now take 60mg twice a day. I really feel that it is making me more depressed and anxious.

REASON: Increased cholesterol, weight gain, severe food cravings.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I LOVE Abilify.  I took this medication for 3 years.  This drug made me "the most normal I've ever been" to quote my mother.  I do however dislike some of the side effects.  I gain weight very quickly on Abilify and experience intense food cravings.  I found that cutting out all processed foods and sugar helped me to stabilize my weight and stop the food cravings.  Unfortunately, no matter how healthfully I ate, my cholesterol went through the roof.  Even on a vegan diet my cholesterol was out of control.  The Dr. took me off Abilify due to it causing an increased cholesterol level.  I'm hoping my new med will work as well as Abilify with less side effects.  If you take this medication, even if you have no noticeable side effects, please make sure your doctor checks your bloodwork at least 4 times per year.

RATING: depression, add to Paxil to boost
REASON: occasional nausea, constipation, helped with fiber and plenty of water, small lip twitching like you may get a twitch in your eye sometimes.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I have noticed a difference in my mood and energy level.  I sleep better at night, but do have vivid dreams that are weird. Am no more hungry than before.  I recommend this drug to those who are considering it.

REASON: The feeling was like a non-stop motor inside of my mind and body. Abilify gave me 10 times wore panic then I was experiencing in the first place. For soeone that has battled panic disorder and general anxiety for over 6 years this is the worst drug I have ever taken. I am still feeling the after effects of this terrible medication.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Do not take these meds for panic/anxiety!

REASON: severe drowsiness, restless legs
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Within a few days of taking Abilify, I knew it wasn't for me. I would have a hard time keeping my eyes open at school, at the same time fidgeting to high heaven. (Bone tired, but the fidgeting kept me awake, it was very frustrating.) I can't say whether it would have eased my depression because I stopped--- in my case the physical side effects were too overwhelming.

REASON: a lot of lethargy, going into depression,
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: abilify has somewhat helped me in clearing negative thoughts and other people talking about me, it has brought back my sharpness a bit, its kind of made me normal except i feel lethargic and sleepy throughtout the day but cant really sleep,

REASON: suicidal thoughts & extreme mania
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I was put on this and lamictal at the same time. After a few weeks everything got worse, my anxiety level was so high. I eventually had a horrible mania phase that resulted in moving 3,000 miles away, and then back, and once again 3,000 miles away. I also suffered from suicidal thoughts--I wanted out! After getting off of it, and upping my lamictal I have been so much better.

REASON: Less tired! More motivation! slight more anxiety. Worked in 3 to 4 days.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Please, someone give some good feedback about Abilify. I wonder why so many negative remarks. Because we are all different I suppose. I am not bipolar, but Zoloft alone was not cutting it. I still wanted to sleep the day away! Adding Abilify has been wonderful. I  now can't sleep during the day even if I tried! At night I am out quickly, from all the motivation and work that I have done throughout the day. This has worked great for me. Please, someone tell me you agree!!

REASON: Wow...  Three days was too long to be on this medication.. Can you say "massive food cravings"??  Geez, I'm not much of an eater, and almost immediately I wanted to bake all kinds of crap and eat constantly.  Sugar, bread, etc. What is up with that????  No more Abilify for me..  I can't imagine THAT helping my mood at ANY point!
None
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: This is an amazing drug that has helped my resistant depression.

AROMASIN: I have been taking Prozac for 15 years.  I have been on dosages

ranging from 20 mg. up to 80 mg.  Recentely I started experiencing reacurring depression.  My doctor started me on a low dose of Abilify and within 1 day I could start to feel my mood lift.  Within one week on the Abilify, I have begun to enjoy many outside interests that I did not want to have anything
to do with. For me, it has been a wonder drug!
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: 2  weeks2 mg. 1X D

REASON: Permanent muscle twitching, rapid weight loss, inability to function much less concentrate or sleep.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I have taken Prozac for 7 years to help with OCD and Bipolar II..when prozac lost its effect, I addef on Abilify. Within a week I started hving uncontrollable facial twitches and my neck was turning on its own. It has been 2 years since I hae stopped taking it and the facial twitches are still present. Be warned.

REASON: None
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Absolutely has changed my life. Have been stable for 3 years now. Was very agitated and couldn't get rid of my depression even though I was on medication for depression. Free of depression for the first time in my life. And no agitation (manic).

REASON: hungry......otherwise I feel like a real person for the first time in YEARS!!!
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I think the Lexapro is the reason I have gained 10lbs. the doctor changed my meds to Prozac in stead and I feel great. I am now able to function in social situations and dont feel the need to hide in my house. I dont feel like people are talking about me as much and I have alot more energy. I hope its not the Abilify that made me gain weight because I will still risk my mental health to avoid getting real big....dont judge

REASON: Middle range sedated
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: All anti psychotics slow you down. I found this med to be better than most

REASON: irritation, AKATHESIA, weight gain, suicidal tendencies
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Abilify is a horrible drug! considering it has a long effect it took me about a week to stop feeling side effects even after stopping. i made trips to the emergency rooms because it drove me crazy and caused suicide thoughts. Please take caution with this medication.

REASON: weight gain, nausea, depression, anxiety
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I would NOT recommend this drug to anyone. I began sinking into a horrible depression after 2 years on this drug and I do not take any other drugs on a daily basis. The weight gain is horrible and no matter how much dieting and exercise I do, the weight will not come off!

REASON: insatiable hunger and weight gain; lack of energy and loss of interest in activities I used to enjoy
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: There must be a better med. somewhere than this without the undesirable side effects (the commercial doesn't refer to it but it should emphasize you become a zombie). My personal recommendation is get a DOG and get out of the house!!

REASON: My heart has been racing like mad, at one point I was afraid I was going to have a heart attack. My panic disorder has seemed to worsen since I've taken Abilify, and I have tremors more often than before. I am extremely mean, irritable and rude to others, even when I don't want to be. I've been numb at some points emotionally, but that has only happened once. I can't sleep, and if I manage to I wake up in the morning with my mind racing, and I end up jumping out of bed and doing things in a hyperactive manner. My chest feels heavy, and I am either burning up in a sweat or freezing cold.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: A lot of people have said it's an amazing drug, but I must just be the 1 in 100 or 1000 that experienced the more serious side effects.

REASON: Extreme insomnia - went from sleeping 9-10 hours night which is needed due to chronic fatigue syndrome to only 5 hours per night even though I'm on a very potent sleep medicine.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: The 1st day I felt like a zombie. The 2nd day and forward, I was unusually happy for someone who has had 3 deaths in their family in the last 6 months. Also increased my appetite which led to 3 # weight gain in those 10 days.

REASON: Hypomania - like taking extra strong shots of espresso every couple of hours.  Completely restless, unable to concentrate, irritable/mean, everyone around moving too slowly, racing thoughts etc.  This drug was supposed to help me with anxiety, which it has, I'm too manic to care.  It has not effected my foggy brain, made anything clearer, or helped me in any way.  I just have a frantic energy like I want to go run five marathons back to back.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Maybe will work well for some, didn't for me.

REASON: Sleep has decreased from 12 hrs a nite to 7 hrs. I do not feel hungry constantly. I do feel a bit hyper, but that was normal before the depression/anxiety. It may or may not be making it worse.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I actually sleep better at nite, fall asleep faster, and wake up more refreshed. This medicine has made a big difference, I feel like I woke up from a 6 month coma and am back to being able to get things done.

REASON: drowsy and spaced out while feeling restless. Cannot stop "wondering" around the house.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I feel like a zombie when I take abilify. Even though my legs and feet are tired from wondering, I still cant seem to stop or sit still. Going to talk to my doc about this

REASON: hiccups, dizzyness, excessive need to sleep, nausea, hypoglycemia
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I know I just started the drug but I do feel much more stable moodwise.  I am hoping the side effects subside soon and that this will finally be a drug that works more than a month

REASON: Extreme Fatigue
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: It made me absolutely exhausted, I would sleep for 15 hours at night and wake up even more tired than when I went to bed. It did keep me from being extremely depressed though, because when I stopped taking it I wound up being hospitalized for depression. Doesn't mean it won't work for others though!

REASON: Sometimes get tardive dyskinesia. Slight headache.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I'm sorry but I can deal with my involuntary movements from the medicine but after 5 days I feel like a different person already.  I'm not in bed all day anymore and things I used to have interest in I'm interested again.  I even lost my job last week but I don't care as long as I feel better than before.  It was Hell before Abilify.

REASON: Insomnia!!!!!  Restless legs, muscle cramping.  Shortness of breath and chest pressure, may be from drug induced anxiety.  Apetite increase and related weight gain.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: It did stabilize my mood but all the side effects left me feeling like crap day in and day out!!!!!  Couldn't ever get comfortable regardless of if I was trying to sleep or just relax while sitting, standing, walking or otherwise conscious!!!!!  Terrible experience!!!!!

REASON: I have been on this medicine a little under a month and I can say that it has changed my life. I was very moody and I think I've finally got it under control. It feels good to be happy and again, and look in the mirror and say, "Hey, you're awesome. Don't let anyone tell you otherwise. You can do this."

Slow urine passing, traumatic headaches, undiagnosed tardive dyskinesia in my hands and lips, "blunt/drugged down" feeling by medicine, restless legs syndrome, removed parts of my own personality because of dulled effect of abilify.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: Took this lethal poison pill for about 5 years until recently I had to cut down the dose on my own, due to causing me tardive dyskinesia in hands, and lips. I do not recommend this poison pill to ANYONE.

AROMASIN: WARNING: Once you start on this medicine you will feel "blunt/drugged" down and you wont be able to have your say about anything anymore because you cant think straight. Dulled down medicine.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: 5  years25 1X D

REASON: Disoriented, lethargic, indifferent, weight gain
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: I started taking Abilify because I would fixate and obsess about things. I was also dealing with anger and irrational behavior. My doctor said I have a busy mind, it has to stay busy or I freak out on stupid things. I could never feel any peace. I was constantly anxious, couldnt stop thinking, worrying, and obsessing. Abilify finally slowed my thoughts down and gave me some peace. However, now I feel like Im too calm. Im always tired and simply feel out of it. My job is suffering because Im forgetful and spacey all the time. My weight is suffering because all I think about now is food. I am glad that Ive had this short period of time of feeling mellow for the first time, but its time to get off of it and feel normal and healthy again, and hopefully redeem myself at work. I'm worried about withdrawal symptoms, but I'm going to go for it! Any similar stories or words of wisdom, please share, I've included my email address.

REASON: energy boost on 2nd day, increased appetite
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: During Cymbalta discontinuation I was pushed in a bad depression. My Dr. prescribed 20mg Prozac, which helpd a lot with my mood. However, I was still extremely tired. After taking 2mg Abilify in the AM I have a lot of energy. It is almost difficult sitting at my desk at work. I feel like running and/or chatting all the time. Have difficulties focusing. Not sure if I stay on Abilify but it really helped giving me my energy back.

REASON: brief periods of dizziness, urine retention, restlessness
SIDE EFFECTS FOR AROMASIN: this works well for me, i was on 5mg for 5 wks which wasnt enough. 10mg reduced my mania and helped me with an unfortunate immediate switch into a depression. i suffered visual hallucination and after upping the dose the depression is gone and the visual disturbance is gone.  i want to stay on this dose but i may move to maintenence of 7.5 in 3 mos. i take klonopin which combats the restlessness....abilify its a good match for me.
